title: Exiles of the Stars
description: Moon Singer/Free Traders science fiction series; June 1979 Third Ace Printing. "The Free Trader starship Lydis appears to be making an ordinary run to the planet Thoth, carrying incense for the great temples of Kartum. And so she is - until a civil war lands her in the middle of a battle of ancient powers and nameless evil, with a Forerunner treasure at its heart."
author: Andre Norton
